unit.creator: Philodemus || Avdoulou, Eleni
unit.title: Index Pythagoreorum || Fr. 48 PHerc. 1508 || Literary Apparatus

dsl.content: Fr. 48 primum edidi 1 (-)ξέ]ν̣ουϲ̣ vel ’Απολλοφά]ν̣ουϲ̣ vel -]ι̣ουϲ̣ vel etiam -]ι̣ου ϲ̣ e.g. * 2 fort. ο̣ἱ̣ ξ̣έ̣ν̣[οι vel ἀν]τ̣ι̣ξ̣ε̣ν̣[ι- *: ο̣τ̣α̣τ̣α̣ Ranocchia
